events.message: I am filing a claim after my car was involved in a collision last night at the intersection.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident based on the description of the vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to handle the damage assessment and guide through the claim process.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the car accident and will proceed with our investigation.
Please submit photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and any medical reports if applicable.
All requested documents including photos and police report for the car accident have been submitted.
Investigation into the circumstances of the car collision has started to determine fault and damages.
The investigation has been completed; the damage report and liability assessment are ready.
Based on the investigation, a settlement amount covering your vehicle repairs has been proposed.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the communication during the process.
Your claim has been approved, and the settlement amount is ready to be processed for payment.
The payment to cover vehicle repairs has been issued and should be received within 3 business days.
The claim has been officially closed after payment, and all necessary steps have been completed.
All claim files and documents are now securely archived for future reference if needed.
